guardian.title: Vladimir Putin's Egypt visit sends message to US
guardian.topComment: Although we can't see it clearly because of our nearness in time to the events, to me it seems like every where we look we can see signs of the White Empire collapsing and breaking apart.

guardian.title: Beck's Grammy win is 'disrespectful to inspiration'
guardian.topComment: Kanye, I'm gonna let you finish....but a couple of quick points;

guardian.title: Obama: I'm as productive as any president since Lyndon Johnson
guardian.topComment: "as when he claimed to be the most productive president in 50 years." Then you quote the president directly "'My first two years in office when I had a Democratic majority and Democratic House and Democratic Senate, we were as productive as any time ...
